name: Dev console
description: Adds inspect element with CTRL + SHIFT + I

name: Backpack
description: Adds in a backpack at the top of the screen, to keep image snips for later.
note: This addon is experimental, and may not always work as intended

name: AI image generator
description: Adds an item in the "new image" menu to generate an image with AI.
note: This addon is experimental, and may not always work as intended

name: Scratchblocks generator
description: Adds an item in the "new image" menu to generate scratchblocks markdown as images
